MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: Music Cleaner, Audio Cleaner, Audio Manager, Audio Management, Delete Audio, Junk Music
English.Char_Desc_45: Music Cleaner is simple music cleaner
English.Char_Desc_80: Music Cleaner is a straight application built for cleaning audio collection
English.Char_Desc_250: Music Cleaner is a clean and straight application built for the purpose of cleaning audio collection.
English.Char_Desc_450: Music Cleaner is a clean and straight application built for the purpose of cleaning audio collection
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Music Cleaner is a clean and straight application built for the purpose of cleaning audio collection.
Features
* Open a folder and list all of its Audio files * Play and seek the audio file * Delete, Move or Copy the file to a specified folder already set in preferences * Basic Player navigation controls like Next, Previous, Play, Pause and Stop * If the folder is not on Removable Media, The file will be deleted to Recycle Bin for Easy Restore * Supports Keyboard Shortcuts

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Any one can distribute this software as long as Its setup is kept intact
